layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x68

    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x52
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 636x52 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
